name: Nightmare (itch) (deepdream)
description:
The video contains spoilers, watch it only when you need to.

Get prepared for a wonderful adventure with... GHOSTS.

This is a maze with only one path.

No storyline. No background setting. No jump scare. (I think so...)

ONLY Horror.

-

If you have bad performance while playing, be sure to lower the graphic settings.
